issues.title: Introduction section ( restructure and re-phrasing)
issues.author: anooptomar29
issues.body:
Use the introduction section just to set the context (and refer protocol draft for protocol specific information to avoid duplication) and state the purpose/objective of this doc. 

Mention of multi element in the introduction section does not fit well with the flow. We should add subsections under “Generic Applicability and Manageability considerations” to discuss aspects specific to Single NE based deployment and Multiple NE deployment, if any.

issues.title: Interworking with Other Congestion Management Mechanisms
issues.author: anooptomar29
issues.body: SCONE most often gets confused with transport level congestion control mechanism such as L4S/ECN-EC. So it will help to explicitly clarify here that SCONE is not meant for transient congestion control  (due to varying load and/or varying channel conditions) of the bottleneck link (such as air interface or any other bottleneck link).  Both the mechanisms i.e SCONE and L4S are intended to address different scenario/use-case in the network. And if needed, both can co-exist in the network as they complement each other.
